:::config { "language": "vue", "theme": "github-dark" }
// @see https://github.com/shikijs/shiki/issues/176
<template>
	<div>
		Shiki doesn't support single quotes with vue
	</div>
</template>

<script>
export default {
	data() {
		return {
			greeting: 'Hello, world!'
		};
	}
};
</script>
:::expectation
<pre class='phiki language-vue github-dark' style='background-color: #24292e;color: #e1e4e8;'><code data-theme='github-dark' data-lang='vue' class='torchlight' style='--theme-selection-background: #39414a'><!-- Syntax highlighted by Phiki and torchlight.dev --><div class='line'><span style="color: #444d56; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number"> 1</span><span class="token" style="color: #e1e4e8;">// @see https://github.com/shikijs/shiki/issues/176

</span></div><div class='line'><span style="color: #444d56; text-align: right; -webkit-user-select: none; user-select: none;" class="line-number">15</span><span class="token" style="color: #e1e4e8;">}</span><span class="token" style="color: #e1e4e8;">;</span><span class="token">
